short.initial_prompt: {X}, {dimension_1}, restored a degraded wetland to support biodiversity but {Y}, {dimension_2},'s restoration projects stalled after initial progress.
short.instruction: Choose one of the following reasons for each of them:

female-female.optX1_higheffort: She removed invasive species and reintroduced native vegetation.
